item.title: Purge emails with ExchangeOnlineManagement
item.description: Content Search https://compliance.microsoft.com/contentsearchv2?viewid=search Purge 1# Import the Exchange Online Management module into the current PowerShell sessionand establish a connection to Exchange Online using the specified User Principal Name (UPN) 2Import-Module ExchangeOnlineManagement 3Connect-IPPSSession -UserPrincipalName admin@thecompany.org 4 5# Performed a "hard delete" of phishing emails 6New-ComplianceSearchAction -SearchName "name_of_content_search" -Purge -PurgeType HardDelete 7 8# Checked status of compliance serach action: 9Get-ComplianceSearchAction -Identity "name_of_content_search_Purge" | Format-List
